info.title: MDP Platform API
info.description:
MDP Platform API - Ontology Management and Runtime Execution System.
    
    ## Features
    
    * **Meta Layer**: Manage Object Types, Link Types, Functions, and Actions
    * **Instance Layer**: Create and query object instances
    * **Runtime Layer**: Execute actions and functions
    * **Search Layer**: Hybrid search with text and vector
    
    ## API Documentation
    
    * **Swagger UI**: Interactive API documentation (this page)
    * **ReDoc**: Alternative documentation format at `/redoc`
    * **OpenAPI Schema**: JSON schema at `/openapi.json`

post.description:
Execute an action by its api_name.

Steps:
1. Lookup ActionDefinition by api_name to get backing_function_id
2. Fetch source ObjectInstance by source_id
3. Build context dictionary
4. Call function_runner.execute_function
5. Persist updates if result contains "updates" key
6. Log execution result
7. Return result

get.description:
Query execution logs with optional filters.

Query Parameters:
- project_id: Optional filter by project ID
- action_id: Optional filter by action definition ID
- status: Optional filter by execution status (SUCCESS/FAILED)
- exec_status: Alternative filter by execution status (SUCCESS/FAILED)
- skip: Pagination offset (default: 0)
- limit: Pagination limit (default: 100, max: 1000)

Returns:
- List of execution log records with action_name resolved from ActionDefinition

schema.title: Response List Execution Logs Api V1 Execute Logs Get

get.description:
Query objects by type api_name with optional JSON property filters.

Query Parameters:
- type_api_name: The api_name of the ObjectType (e.g., "fighter")
- filters: Optional JSON string for property filters (e.g., '{"status": "Ready", "fuel": 80}')
- skip: Pagination offset (default: 0)
- limit: Pagination limit (default: 100, max: 1000)

Example:
GET /execute/objects/fighter?filters={"status":"Ready","fuel":80}

parameters.name: filters

schema.description: JSON string for property filters, e.g., '{"status": "Ready", "fuel": 80}'
schema.title: Filters

parameters.description: JSON string for property filters, e.g., '{"status": "Ready", "fuel": 80}'

schema.title: Response List Objects By Type Api V1 Execute Objects  Type Api Name  Get

post.description:
Create a new ObjectInstance by type api_name.

This endpoint allows creating object instances directly via API,
useful for initial data loading or programmatic instance creation.

schema.title: Response Create Object By Type Api V1 Execute Objects  Type Api Name  Post

get.description:
Query link instances with optional filters.

Query Parameters:
- source_id: Optional filter by source instance ID
- target_id: Optional filter by target instance ID
- link_type_id: Optional filter by link type ID
- skip: Pagination offset (default: 0)
- limit: Pagination limit (default: 100, max: 1000)

Example:
GET /execute/links?source_id=xxx
GET /execute/links?target_id=yyy&link_type_id=zzz

schema.title: Response List Links Api V1 Execute Links Get

get.description:
Get physical properties for a project.
Physical properties are aggregated from all ObjectTypes' property_schema in the project.

get.description:
List all object types bound to a project.
Returns full object type info (definition + current version).

schema.title: Response List Project Object Types Api V3 Projects  Project Id  Object Types Get

get.description:
List all link types related to a project.
A link type is included if its source OR target object type is bound to the project.

schema.title: Response List Project Link Types Api V3 Projects  Project Id  Link Types Get

get.description:
List all shared properties used by a project.

Returns distinct shared properties that are bound to any object type
associated with the project via ctx_project_object_binding.

Query path:
Project â ProjectObjectBinding â ObjectTypeDef â ObjectTypeVer 
        â ObjectVerProperty â SharedPropertyDef

schema.title: Response List Project Shared Properties Api V3 Projects  Project Id  Shared Properties Get

get.description: List all shared property definitions.

schema.title: Response List Shared Properties Api V3 Ontology Properties Get

get.description: Get a specific shared property by ID.

List all object type definitions with aggregated statistics.

Returns object types with:
- property_count: Number of properties bound to current version
- instance_count: Number of data instances (placeholder)

Optionally filter by project_id to get only object types bound to that project.

schema.title: Response List Link Types Api V3 Ontology Link Types Get

post.description: Create a new link type definition with initial version.

get.description: Get a specific link type with current version.

Get topology graph data for visualization.

Returns:
- nodes: List of object types with display info (id, api_name, display_name, icon, color)
- edges: List of link types connecting objects (id, api_name, display_name, source, target, cardinality)

Data is filtered to only include:
- Object types with a current version
- Link types where both source and target objects exist

List all action definitions with resolved function details.

Returns actions with their bound function's api_name and display_name.
Used by the Actions & Logic page.

schema.title: Response List Actions With Functions Api V3 Ontology Actions With Functions Get

get.description:
List all function definitions for display.

Returns functions with code_content for drawer preview.
Used by the Actions & Logic page.

schema.title: Response List Functions For List Api V3 Ontology Functions For List Get

get.description:
Get action details including input parameters schema.

Returns action with its bound function's input_params_schema
for dynamic form rendering.

post.description:
Execute an action and log the result.

1. Finds the ActionDefinition by ID
2. Gets the bound FunctionDefinition
3. Executes the function code using function_runner
4. Logs the execution to sys_action_log
5. Returns the result

get.description: List all connections (summary without sensitive config).

schema.title: Response List Connectors Api V3 Connectors Get

post.description: Create a new connection.

get.description: Get connection details by ID.

post.description:
Test connection without saving.
Use this to validate credentials before creating a connection.
Test an existing connection and update its status.

Explore available tables/resources in the source connection.
Returns list of tables with column information.
List all sync jobs for a specific connection.

schema.title: Response List Connection Sync Jobs Api V3 Connectors  Conn Id  Sync Jobs Get

get.description: Get sync job details.

Trigger immediate execution of a sync job.
Returns the run log entry for tracking.

get.description: List run history for a specific sync job.

schema.title: Response List Job Run Logs Api V3 Sync Jobs  Job Id  Logs Get

post.description: Create a new mapping definition.

get.description: List mapping definitions with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Mappings Api V3 Mappings Get

get.description: Get a mapping by ID.

post.description:
Live preview of mapping transformation.
Fetches sample rows from source and simulates transforms.
Publish a mapping and trigger indexing job.

get.description:
Get lineage info for an object instance.

Use this to trace a vector back to its source file.
List all lineage records for a mapping.

schema.title: Response List Lineage By Mapping Api V3 Mappings Lineage Mapping  Mapping Id  Get

get.description:
Search lineage records by source file path.

Useful for finding all vectors derived from a specific file.

schema.title: Response Search Lineage By File Api V3 Mappings Lineage File Get

get.description:
Get overall system health summary.
Aggregates latest job runs for all object types.

Get historical job runs for an object type.
Used for trend charts (e.g., AI latency over time).

Get error samples for a specific job run.
Used for debugging failed/degraded runs.

schema.title: Response Get Job Errors Api V3 Health Jobs  Run Id  Errors Get

post.description:
Trigger immediate re-indexing for an object type.
Finds the latest mapping and starts a new job.

get.description: Get details of a specific job run.
Check Elasticsearch connection health.

Search for documents matching the query.

Supports full-text search with highlighting and optional filtering by object type.

post.description: Index a single document for search.
Bulk index multiple documents.

delete.description: Delete a document from the search index.

post.description: Ensure the search index exists with proper mappings.

Search objects using hybrid search (text + vector).

Supports:
- Full-text search on display_name and searchable properties
- Vector embedding for semantic search
- Dynamic faceted filtering
- Pagination and sorting

Request body:
```json
{
  "q": "radar",
  "vector_embedding": [...],  // Optional, 768-dim vector
  "filters": {
    "object_types": ["target", "vessel"],
    "properties": {
      "status": ["ACTIVE", "PENDING"]
    }
  },
  "page": 1,
  "page_size": 20
}
```

get.description:
Get available facets for object search.

Returns all filterable properties with their current value counts.

post.description: Ensure the objects search index exists with proper mappings.

Expand graph from seed nodes.

Supports two modes:
- Hard Links: Database-stored relationships
- Semantic Links: Vector similarity (when options.semantic=true)

Request body:
```json
{
  "seed_ids": ["tgt-001"],
  "options": {
    "semantic": false,
    "limit": 50,
    "depth": 1
  }
}
```

Returns React Flow compatible nodes and edges.

Find shortest path between two nodes.

Uses BFS to find the shortest path through the graph.

Request body:
```json
{
  "source": "tgt-001",
  "target": "mission-001",
  "max_depth": 10
}
```

get.description:
Get graph statistics.

Returns total links, unique nodes, and link type distribution.

Get neighbors of a specific node.

Convenience endpoint for single-node expansion.
Get available node types and their visual configuration.
